messages.title: A Strong Voice for Hackney
messages.content: Jack Tinley is hard working, and will stand up for South Hackney and Shoreditch.

messages.title: Coalition of Chaos
messages.content: Voting for any other party than the Conservatives will lead to a coalition propped up by the Liberal Democrats and their friends in the minor parties.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting for any other party than the Conservatives will lead to a coalition propped up by the Liberal Democrats and their friends in the minor parties.

issues.economy: Jack will continue the Conservatives' work on fixing the economy.
issues.education: Jack Tinley will fight to ensure children have the best start in life.
issues.health: He will work to make Health and Social Care even better in the constituency.

housing.content: Jack Tinley will work to improve housing standards.

politicalExperience.achievements: Jack has a track record as a town hall campaigner and has fought for residents on many of their concerns.

images.caption: Jack Tinley standing in front of a residential area.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet argues that Jack Tinley is a hard working local campaigner who will fight for South Hackney and Shoreditch at a national level.
